title: godoc: Viewing go source code no longer includes line numbers.
body:
by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
Two related issues.

First, line numbers are no longer being displayed for Go source code.

Second, search results can include links to source code.  These links attempt to take a
user to the exact line of the source file that matches the query.  The source code view
no longer includes the anchors necessary for this to work.
